<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

Installation of silo fails on OpenSUSE Leap 15.1.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install silo
...
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/tmp/andrew/spack-stage/spack-stage-silo-4.10.2-gylg4okcb5kgxxayjdpntujfdwgnnso6/spack-src/configure' '--prefix=/home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/silo-4.10.2-gylg4okcb5kgxxayjdpntujfdwgnnso6' '--with-hdf5=/home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/hdf5-1.10.6-fdsvphcdrlkpltlipzpqgrflfgmff2kc/include,/home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/hdf5-1.10.6-fdsvphcdrlkpltlipzpqgrflfgmff2kc/lib' '--with-zlib=/home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/zlib-1.2.11-ggukd2qjpjcrc4t5wobmyslvvoohzbsl/include,/home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/zlib-1.2.11-ggukd2qjpjcrc4t5wobmyslvvoohzbsl/lib' '--enable-install-lite-headers' '--enable-fortran' '--disable-silex' '--enable-shared' 'CC=/home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/mpich-3.3.2-fzkxrbmc5bjmwcljcuo2ismb26j5lwkr/bin/mpicc' 'CXX=/home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/mpich-3.3.2-fzkxrbmc5bjmwcljcuo2ismb26j5lwkr/bin/mpic++' 'FC=/home/andrew/sta-toolchain/spack/opt/spack/linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/mpich-3.3.2-fzkxrbmc5bjmwcljcuo2ismb26j5lwkr/bin/mpif90'

1 error found in build log:
     184    checking for fpclass... no
     185    checking for strerror... yes
     186    checking if setjmp and longjmp work... yes
     187    checking for cos in -lm... yes
     188    checking for szlib... suppressed
     189    checking for hdf5... configure: checking for hdf5 and supporting libraries...
  >> 190    configure: error: problem with directory specified for hdf5 library
```

This looks like the [same error I reported for gcc](https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/17556). The [workaround](https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/17556#issuecomment-660444638) I used for that works in this case too:

```bash
spack install --only dependencies silo
find spack -type d -name lib64 -execdir ln -s lib64 lib \;
spack install silo
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.15.4
* **Python:** 3.6.10
* **Platform:** linux-opensuse_leap15-haswell
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5451588/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5451589/spack-build-out.txt)

title: Installation issue: silo
